summary: Software Engineer holding a Master's degree in Software Engineering. Knowledge of full-stack development, complemented by over a year of hands-on internship experience. Passionate about creating efficient and innovative solutions to real-world problems. Eager to leverage technical skills, collaborative mindset, and continuous learning attitude to contribute effectively to a dynamic development team.

contacts.location: Ponte de Lima, Viana do Castelo, Portugal

education.title: Graduation in Software Engineering
body: Technologies: Java, C#, SQL, Git.

education.title: Master's in Software Engineering
body: Technologies: JavaScript, Python, Express, Git, Docker.

academicalAndPersonalProjects.title: "Checkers" Board Game
body: The computer version of the famous Java checkers board game. GUI implemented through the Java Swing library

academicalAndPersonalProjects.title: 3D Scenario Generator
body: A generator and a 3D engine were developed in the context of a Course Unit, using C++ and the OpenGL library

academicalAndPersonalProjects.title: File Transfer Server
body: Created an application that, when receiving HTTP requests for file requests, will communicate with the servers registered to the application by UDP and forward the files received from the servers to the client

professionalExperience.title: Software Engineer Professional Internship
body: Developed a clinic management software utilizing Angular framework for the frontend and C#, ASP.NET for the backend.
Implemented key features, such as appointment scheduling, patient records management, and billing system, resulting in enhanced clinic workflow and improved efficiency.
Designed and developed a custom component, eliminating the need to purchase an expensive third-party solution, resulting in substantial cost savings for the company.
Collaborated with stakeholders to gather requirements, provide regular updates, and ensure the software met the desired specifications.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and the ability to quickly adapt to changing project requirements.

professionalExperience.title: Backend Engineer Summer Internship
body: Strengthened expertise in JavaScript, Node.js, GraphQL, Docker, gRPC, and ORM (Knex).
Implemented Unit Testing using Jest and Mocha, ensuring high-quality and reliable codebase.
Acknowledged Git commands for optimized repository management and collaboration.
Gained hands-on experience with testing environments.
Successfully completed assigned tasks involving gRPC and GraphQL, demonstrating problem-solving abilities and domain knowledge.

professionalExperience.title: Software Developer Summer Internship
body: Conducted comprehensive analysis of product output across various versions, playing a pivotal role in identifying and rectifying bugs to ensure top-notch quality assurance.
Employed Git version control proficiently to enhance product stability and foster collaborative teamwork, promoting a more efficient and synchronized development process.
Implemented Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) to orchestrate team dynamics and bolster productivity, resulting in streamlined workflows and successful project deliveries.
Utilized ANTLR in combination with C# for intricate code parsing, precisely employing visitors for improved code parsing and processing.

skills: Unit testing and test automation (Jest, Mocha);
observations: Part-time worker at local restaurants since 2018.
